Tuskegee Scholars: Research, Pedagogy, and Discovery

UC Berkeley, Summer 2022

Instructors: Lisa Yan yanlisa@eecs.berkeley.edu
Room: SOCS 174 (through July 1); Evans 6 (July 5th onwards)

Announcements

Welcome~

Jun 13 · 0 min read

Welcome! This website will serve as a resource for you as you move through this summer program. We recommend bookmarking this website for easy access.

Please see the sidebar for the pre-Data 6 Coding Bootcamp link.

Additionally, please make sure you have access to the following course resources:

  1. Schedule
  2. RPD Slack
  3. DataHub

If you don’t have access to any of the above websites, please email yanlisa@eecs.berkeley.edu.

See you soon!
Lisa
